mapper.select: SELECT `product_id`, `ticket_no`, `product_no`, `term_no`, `product_name`, `distribution_channel`, `pay_type`, `pay_price`, `order_cancel`, `whether_user_phone`, `whether_user_id`, `whether_make`, `certificate_exchange`, `park_way`, `park_address`, `tick_type`, `use_explain`, `whether_refund`, `whether_examine`, `refund_explain`, `cost_includes`, `cost_not_includes`, `whether_user_name`, `whether_shelves`, `template_sms_no`, `template_mms_no`, `settlement_price`, `ticket_grouping`, `effective_days`, `whether_shelves_advance`, `advance_start_date`, `advance_end_date`, `user_role_id`, `template_no`, `img_url`, `whether_sure_ride`, `subordinate_line`, `whether_refund_strategy`, a.strategy_no, a.base_url, a.is_entity, `refund_strategy_detail_no`, `whether_limit_sell`, `sell_date_type`, `limit_sell_num`, `product_provider`, `car_fee`, `product_type`, a.company_no, `whether_limit_stock`, `product_second_type`, b.strategy_details_name, product_type_name, a.sort, whether_real_name FROM product_spot_ticket a left JOIN base_refund_strategy_details b on a.refund_strategy_detail_no = b.strategy_details_no WHERE product_id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into product_spot_ticket ( `ticket_no`, `product_no`, `term_no`, `product_name`, `distribution_channel`, `pay_type`, `pay_price`, `order_cancel`, `whether_user_phone`, `whether_user_id`, `whether_make`, `certificate_exchange`, `park_way`, `park_address`, `tick_type`, `use_explain`, `whether_refund`, `whether_examine`, `refund_explain`, `cost_includes`, `cost_not_includes`, `whether_user_name`, `whether_shelves`, `template_sms_no`, `template_mms_no`, `settlement_price`, `ticket_grouping`, `effective_days`, `whether_shelves_advance`, `advance_start_date`, `advance_end_date`, `user_role_id`, `template_no`, `img_url`, `whether_sure_ride`, `subordinate_line`, `whether_refund_strategy`, `strategy_no`, `refund_strategy_detail_no`, `whether_limit_sell`, `sell_date_type`, `limit_sell_num`, `product_provider`, `car_fee`, `product_type`, `company_no`, `whether_limit_stock`, `product_second_type`, `base_url`, `is_entity`, product_type_name, whether_real_name ) values ( #{ticketNo}, #{productNo}, #{termNo}, #{productName}, #{distributionChannel}, #{payType}, #{payPrice}, #{orderCancel}, #{whetherUserPhone}, #{whetherUserId}, #{whetherMake}, #{certificateExchange}, #{parkWay}, #{parkAddress}, #{tickType}, #{useExplain}, #{whetherRefund}, #{whetherExamine}, #{refundExplain}, #{costIncludes}, #{costNotIncludes}, #{whetherUserName}, #{whetherShelves}, #{templateSmsNo}, #{templateMmsNo}, #{settlementPrice}, #{ticketGrouping}, #{effectiveDays}, #{whetherShelvesAdvance}, #{advanceStartDate}, #{advanceEndDate}, #{userRoleId}, #{templateNo}, #{imgUrl}, #{whetherSureRide}, #{subordinateLine}, #{whetherRefundStrategy}, #{strategyNo}, #{refundStrategyDetailNo}, #{whetherLimitSell}, #{sellDateType}, #{limitSellNum}, #{productProvider}, #{carFee}, #{productType}, #{companyNo}, #{whetherLimitStock}, #{productSecondType}, #{baseUrl}, #{isEntity}, #{productTypeName}, #{whetherRealName} )
